posts.post_content:
Prices are net to me and delivered. Thanks for looking. 

PSA 1 Chase White Cap Sov 150. ***SOLD*** Tough combo. If you are collecting off backs it’s EPDG, OM or Sov and the EPDG & OM have a combined PSA pop of 14. 

SGC 3 Turner port Sov 350 $150 ***SOLD***

PSA 2.5 Bergen batting. $110. Sneaky tougher card. Check eBay current and completed listings. ***SOLD***

Bergen Sold. Price lowered on Turner
Hi Scott, I’ll take the Turner, pm coming
